1.title: welcome to camelot
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: A Study in Style
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Champions of the Fourth Estate
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: The TRUTH About ARTHUR PENDRAGON
4.plot: This is the first episode of a hard-hitting exposé about the ROT AT THE CENTER of Camelot. We hit UNCONSTITUTIONAL obstacles RIGHT OUT OF THE GATE, so that's where our exposé starts.

5.title: What's in the Box?
5.plot: Kay's carefully crafted tutorial on shoes was rudely interrupted, but she got to the most important part. Boat shoes: Not even once.

6.title: Camelot is PROBLEMATIC
6.plot: Fascist administrators are FAR from Camelot's only problem. If you're not OUTRAGED you're NOT paying attention.

7.title: Arthur Pendragon's SON Joins the REVOLUTION
7.plot: " ran into Arthur Pendragon's son and now there are BIG THINGS on the horizon. --Izzy"

8.title: The Revolution BEGINS
8.plot: "We're doing this. We're gonna change the way things are DONE in Camelot. --Izzy"

9.title: A Friend in Need
9.plot: "Sudden changes in coolness should not be ignored. - Kay "

10.title: The Committee to Unelect the President
10.plot: "This is the beginning of the REVOLUTION. Stay tuned to this channel for more from the most important school board campaign in the HISTORY of Camelot. --Izzy"

11.title: The FIRST Mordred for School Board Campaign Meeting
11.plot: "The work behind a revolution may not be glamorous, but it's important. --Izzy"

12.title: Nelly Inglewood SELLS OUT
12.plot: "This isn't EXACTLY campaign related, but THE WORLD NEEDS TO KNOW. --Izzy"

13.title: OUTRAGEOUS Camelot School Board Petition Procedures UNCOVERED
13.plot: "People need to KNOW how things are DONE in local politics!" --Izzy"

14.title: Partisan Politics
14.plot: "Mordred and Izzy kept going back and forth over whether to post this. Honestly, you'd think one of them would recognize quality entertainment when it flies in front of their face. - Kay"

15.title: Regarding the Incident in the Previous Video
15.plot: Mordred just wanted to post the official statement, but I think a happy ending is so much more satisfying when you see what it took to get there, don't you?

16.title: Makeover Montage!
16.plot: "Everybody stop what you're doing right now and watch this amazing prom makeover. From drab to fab in under six minutes!"

17.title: good news
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: An INSIDE LOOK at Political Platforms
18.plot: "It took us five hours, a lot of headaches, and Nelly got kinda loopy there for a while, but we did it. WE HAVE A PLATFORM. And now YOU, the VOTERS, can see how these decisions are made. --Izzy"

19.title: Take a Penny, Leave a Penny
19.plot: The gang attends Prom and chases a little luck afterwards.

20.title: Style and Substance
20.plot: "Today's a little break from our regular fashion and lifestyle content. I've got four dazzling interviews with the staff of the Mordred for School Board campaign. In this one, learn the ins and outs of campaign outreach!"

23.title: A. Mordred Pendragon
23.plot: "Today's a little break from our regular fashion and lifestyle content. I've got four dazzling interviews with the staff of the Mordred for School Board campaign. In this one, you can get to know the candidate himself!"

24.title: The good news about mordred pendragon
24.plot: "sometimes you just get the urge to montage. - nelly"

25.title: Politics Is NOT Entertainment
25.plot: "Apparently this campaign will be PANDERING to a politically uninformed populace. --Izzy"

26.title: Party Planning Update
26.plot: "First upload, yay? I thought you guys should all have an update on Kay's parties even if we haven't had a real meeting in a few days. ~~Vicky"

27.title: Establishment REFUSES to Endorse Progressive Candidates
27.plot: "It's an OUTRAGE that genuinely progressive candidates can't get any party support. --Izzy"

28.title: School's Out!
28.plot: The gang gets ready for summer.

29.title: The INNER WORKINGS of a Canvassing Operation

30.title: That's Infotainment!
30.plot: "Vicky's preparing to host a campaign event (!!!) and I thought it was the perfect opportunity to make a little vlog about the art of entertaining. Remember, it's about the guest, not the host. Kay "

31.title: Happy Birthday, Mordred!
31.plot: "Just a really quick upload, since we're all busy getting ready for Vicky's meet and greet. Happy birthday, Mordred. We know you'll knock 'em dead. Vera"

32.title: Meet and Greet
32.plot: "Vicky's meet and greet went stupendously. If you couldn't make it in person, here's a little snippet (uploaded with the constituent's consent, of course). Kay "

35.title: Libel
35.plot: "All I wanted to do with this video was talk fashion. But apparently the good voters of Camelot couldn't let me do that. Kay "

36.title: ELECTION DAY
36.plot: "So things got a little weird at the end there but I'm ignoring that and focusing on the REAL CHANGE we're gonna bring to Camelot, right after the GENERAL ELECTION!!. --Izzy"

38.title: The Legally Distinct from the Odd Couple
38.plot: Mordred moves in to Izzy's place.

39.title: Get Out the Vote!
39.plot: "This election is ours to win, but to do that we have to get people to VOTE. --Izzy"

40.title: TRANSPARENCY in Politics
40.plot: "Mordred for School Board is the only campaign releasing ALL campaign staff's grades to the public. --Izzy"

42.title: Spitfire
42.plot: "I take it all back, Ms. Garlot. Please adopt me. Kay "

44.title: Meet the Elaines
44.plot: "We have volunteers. I'm so pleased to introduce you to Elaine Astolat, Elaine Corbenic, Elaine Galis, and Elaine B. (It is B, right Elaine? Let me know if I have it wrong and I'll fix it!) Kay "

45.title: Selling Out
45.plot: "I don't even know. Maybe I overreacted, I don't know. But probably this is gonna end up affecting the campaign somehow, so probably you guys should see it. --Izzy"

46.title: What We Made
46.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

47.title: Image
47.plot: "Hey Izzy, no pressure but we'd all feel better if you talked to us? ~~Vicky"

48.title: Work Lunch
48.plot: "Guys guess what Nelly showed me how to upload videos so I'm unstoppable now. Gavin!"

49.title: Izzy Apologizes for His Performative Allyship
49.plot: "I had an embarrassing tongue slip in the middle of this video that Nelly refused to cut out because of artistic integrity, so I'm taking over editing for the day. We're all glad to have Izzy back. Hannah "

50.title: The Newly Dating Game
50.plot: "Things have been heavy around here lately, so I decided to lighten things up a bit with a round of the Newlywed Game with my two favorite couples. Things got a liiiiittle competitive, but it's all in good fun. Kay "

51.title: Lawn Signs, ASSEMBLE!
51.plot: "Getting back into the swing of things, I guess."

52.title: Ambushed
52.plot: "Stay tuned to the campaign social media for some staff changes. Mordred"

53.title: Vicky's Say
53.plot: "Nobody had better take this down. Vera"

55.title: What Now?
55.plot: "The campaign is still adjusting to the recent staff changes, but we're pleased to announce that Heather Sinclair has agreed to take over as social media manager. Vera"

56.title: Back to Business
56.plot: "If you follow my social media, you know that I'm no longer with the Mordred for School Board campaign, but that doesn't mean that I'm no longer socially active. Get out there and find a cause or a candidate you believe in. Borrow flats if you have to.

57.title: On the Way to the Fall Festival
57.plot: "Mordred attended Camelot's Fall Festival today. It was a great event, but the organizers turned out not to be super psyched about cameras. We did film the walk there, which got a little deeper than I think either of us meant. Vera"

58.title: The Debate
58.plot: "This is kind of personal, but it's probably something the voters of Camelot School District deserve to see. Uploaded with the permission of Arthur Pendragon. Mordred"

59.title: For Gwen and Lance
59.plot: "Gwen, Lance, I am so sorry for everything. Mordred"

60.title: For the Past and Present Members of the Mordred for School Board Campaign
60.plot: "Hey guys. I know you've put up with a lot from me lately. I just hope you all know how much you all rock. Mordred"

61.title: For You
61.plot: "If you live in Camelot, Cornwall, or Carlisle, this one's for you. Mordred"

62.title: For Izzy
62.plot: "It's stupid that you're in the same house and I don't feel like I can talk to you. Mordred"

63.title: A Party
63.plot: "The campaign team is BACK TOGETHER, baby. Vicky, Hannah, Kay and I talked it over after we saw Mordred's videos, and this is a campaign that we're proud to be a part of. --Izzy"

64.title: The Pen Is Mightier
64.plot: "I was a teeny tiny bit late to a meeting because my reflexology appointment ran over, and they started without me. But Vicky's ideas were all great, of course. Kay "

65.title: Failure
65.plot: "Mordred has the endorsement of all three Democratic committees in the Camelot school district. I just hope that'll be enough - ~~Vicky"

66.title: getting technical
66.plot: "today's the last day to register to vote in a bunch of states. - nelly"

67.title: VERY EXCITING Developments
67.plot: "This is maybe not TECHNICALLY campaign related, but the WORLD NEEDS TO KNOW!" --Izzy"

68.title: Slumber Party for Cool People Only
68.plot: "I don't know what I'm going to do without this girl next year, honestly. Kay "

69.title: Phone Banking
69.plot: "Less than three weeks to election day everyone. Make Gavin's job a little easier and find your polling place: ~~Vicky"

70.title: The Millennial Trifecta
70.plot: "I guess this is what they call the October surprise. Well, I don't like it, and I think the perpetrators should be crushed. Kay "

71.title: Crushed
71.plot: "I'm looking forward to putting this incident behind us and focusing on the issues that matter to this election. Mordred"

72.title: A Psa Not Technically Affiliated With the Mordred for School Board Campaign
72.plot: "everyone i know is a little bit terrified all the time. vote to take some of that away. - nelly"

73.title: The LAST Campaign Meeting!
73.plot: "Just ONE MORE WEEK until the election. Looks like we're out of luck so we'll just have to keep knocking on doors and hope that's enough. I think there are some people in Camelot we haven't canvassed yet - probably - --Izzy"

74.title: What Happened at Avalon Pond
74.plot: "The coin is back in the pond. Now do you guys believe me? Vera"

75.title: General Election Day
75.plot: "Sorry about the wait. It was a very long day for us, and then we had to wait for results just like you guys did. We promise, if it was hard for you, it was just as hard for us. --Izzy, Nelly and Kay (co-editors of this video)"

76.title: Thank You and Good Night
76.plot: "Thank you so much to our brilliant, dedicated, tireless campaign team. And thank you to Camelot, Cornwall, and Carlisle. Mordred and Izzy"

77.title: A Hell of a Year
77.plot: "Nelly says if she knew what to put in the description box thingy she wouldn't have had to make a video, so I'm just gonna say that this year has been awesome and all our friends are awesome and voting is awesome and lacrosse is awesome. And now that Mordred's on the school board and Nelly and I are an unstoppable crime fighting picture painting MACHINE, probably next year's gonna be even more awesome. Gavin (and Nelly)!"
